sentence.Network_en: The airport is in the hands of French paratroops.
sentence.Network_cn: 那座机场由法国空降兵控制。

sentence.Network_en: His boots and purple beret identify him as commanding the Scottish Paratroops.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的长靴和紫色贝雷帽表明他统领着苏格兰伞兵部队。

sentence.Network_en: They saw enemy paratroops dropping from the aeroplane.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们看到敌人伞兵部队从飞机上降下来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 空间站 space station空降部队 paratroops空难 air crash

list.abs: the same time , a paratrooper force was heliborne to the rear the defensive positions and destroyed the artillery , preventing it from engaging Israeli armor and infantry .同时，一个伞兵旅由直升机运送到防守位置的后方，摧毁了埃军的大炮，使其不能对以军的装甲和步兵构成威胁。
2004年6月20日 -  U.S. paratroopers 美国伞兵 U.S. Secretary of State Colin Powell 美国国务卿鲍威尔 U.S. Special Forces 美军特种部队 U.S.Army Lieut. 美国.
paper slipper纸拖鞋paratroop boot伞兵靴pairs blue巴蓝
paper slipper 纸拖鞋paratroop boot 伞兵鞋peeptoe 露趾尖式凉鞋
British paratroopers writing slogans on their Horsa gliding plane ., 写在他们的滑翔机霍萨英国伞兵的口号.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: from an abbreviation of parachute + troops (plural of troop)

entry.def: Paratroops are soldiers who are trained to be dropped by parachute into battle or into enemy territory.

example.ex: The airport is in the hands of French paratroops.
example.tran: 那座机场由法国空降兵控制。

means.word_mean: 1. infantry trained and equipped to parachute

auth_sentence.content: The bulk of the paratroops were bottled up west of the town.
auth_sentence.res_content: The bulk of the paratroops were bottled up west of the town.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The bulk of the paratroops were bottled up west of the town.

auth_sentence.content: The Schloss Adler is inaccessible and impregnable. It would require a battalion of paratroops to take it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Schloss Adler is inaccessible and impregnable. It would require a battalion of paratroops to take it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Schloss Adler is inaccessible and impregnable. It would require a battalion of paratroops to take it.

auth_sentence.content: By now the paratroops had few anti-tank weapons, they had no food, and, crucially, they had little ammunition left.
auth_sentence.res_content: By now the paratroops had few anti-tank weapons, they had no food, and, crucially, they had little ammunition left.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By now the paratroops had few anti-tank weapons, they had no food, and, crucially, they had little ammunition left.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"半,类似,辅助"; 2. 表示"降落伞"; 3. 表示"在旁边"

stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准军事性的,起军事辅助作用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+military军事的→准军事的
para半,类似,辅助+political政治的→adj.半政治的
para半,类似,辅助+state国+al的→adj.半官方的
para在旁边+bol抛+ic的→adj.抛物线[状]的
para在旁边+noid=note注意→在旁边注意→怀疑的
para半,类似,辅助+legal法律的→辅助法律的
para半,类似,辅助+medic医师,实习医生→n.护理人员
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释
para降落伞+chut落下+e→n.降落伞
para降落伞+drop扔下→n.空投,空降

stems_affixes.value_cn: 伞兵部队, 空降部队
stems_affixes.word_buile: para降落伞+troop部队+s→n.伞兵部队, 空降部队
para在旁边+digm显示→在旁边显示给[别人]→示范
para在旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾
para在旁边+gon角→旁边顶尖人物→典范
para在旁边+log说话逻辑+ism现象,状态→在逻辑边上→不是逻辑
para旁边+sit坐+e→坐在在旁边[吃]→吃白食→寄生虫,食客
para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使瘫痪[麻痹];使丧失作用
stems_affixes.word_buile: para在旁边+lyze分开→旁边分开→瘫痪
